alert.note: Alert for Luna (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 8:13PM MDT until May 13 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Luna County in southwestern New Mexico... * Until 900 PM MDT. * At 813 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Sunshine, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Rock Hound State Park and Spring Canyon State Park. This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 87 and 99. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
